title: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
description: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
OB: When adding jar files to the build path using classpath variables, you have to specify each jar file separately, even if there are several in the same directory.
EB: It should be possible to add all jar files in a folder to the build path at once, without the need to specify each file separately.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the build path settings in the software.
2. Navigate to the classpath variables section.
3. Add a jar file from a specific folder to the build path.
4. Notice that only the selected jar file is added, and not the other jar files in the same folder.
